title: BAOFENG BF-9700 Dual Band Two-Way Radio, Waterproof Dustproof IP67 Walkie Talkie Transceiver, UHF, with High Gain Antenna and 1800mAh Battery, Black
features: ✔FCC Part 15B Dustproof and waterproof resisting two way radio. After 30 minutes into one meter underwater, the radio still works very well.
✔It ensures BF-9700's reliability in wet environments. No matter where you are, swimming pool or desert, you may enjoy with BF-9700!
✔Frequency range: UHF 400-520 MHz 65MHz-108MHz (only commercial FM radio reception)
✔Incorporates 105 codes "DQT" and 50 privacy codes "QT" programmable; Broadband (Wide) / Narrowband (Narrow) selectable; High power / low power selectable; Timer transmission "TOT" programmable
✔Function Busy Channel Lock "BCL"; Level Threshold "Squelch" adjustable from 0 to 9; Transmit 1750 Tone; Channel frequency-report
description: Output Power: 7W(H)/5W(M)/1W(L)Frequency Range: 400. 00-520. 00MHzIP67 waterproof and dustproofThis is a BF-9700 dustproof and waterproof resisting two way radio. After 30 minutes into one meter underwater, the radio still works very well. It ensures BF-9700's reliability in wet environments. No matter where you are, swimming pool or desert, you may enjoy with BF-9700!
